title: Project Ava: Fixing UI and App dev
excerpt: Converting the Ava website into a custom Android APK and refining the UI layout.
author: Codem
content:
Project Overview

Using my android template for app development in android studio I've been working on, I converted the ngrok Ava website into an APK for personal use.

UI Improvements and Fixes

I addressed a layout issue where the send button on the side was off-centered, ensuring better placement for mobile use.

The website was further adjusted to improve the fitting for the app, utilizing the template that converts websites into native apps.

Both the website and the app have been updated with new icons for a more professional look.

Future Plans

For the next phase of development, I am looking into implementing push notifications directly via the APK rather than relying on Termux.

You can check out my portfolio to see more of my recent updates.
